attributes.action: require local authorities to have minimum standards for the surfaces of roads and pavements to protect the safety of users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Roads and pavements in Surrey are a disgrace to a post millenium, first world country.  I am sick of seeing firm and infirm people falling and hurting themselves and dangerous driving brought about by the dodging of pot-holes in the roads.  I see far better infrastructure in most other European countries.
